597728f8-1a3f-47bf-a834-093fa61ab896.name: 战斗反射
597728f8-1a3f-47bf-a834-093fa61ab896.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

43be4fc5-4ec9-4486-9e2d-9dd9e2cd7be5.name: 健康
43be4fc5-4ec9-4486-9e2d-9dd9e2cd7be5.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

20ac88cb-6048-4421-973d-01e609c33e35.name: Effects: Highly Addictive (-5 on withdrawal roll)

c00a1e2d-584f-46b7-8e81-7b2634f03d9c.name: Effects: Totally Addictive (-10 on withdrawal roll)

4747648e-9ac7-4cd8-92c1-32c105cce18f.name: 视力不良（近视）
4747648e-9ac7-4cd8-92c1-32c105cce18f.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

a3ef1b5c-8061-4a61-936f-5050e512937e.name: 视力不良（远视）
a3ef1b5c-8061-4a61-936f-5050e512937e.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

d06ec599-73f7-4a72-8e1c-85b98b15907a.name: 期待陪伴
d06ec599-73f7-4a72-8e1c-85b98b15907a.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

f620efaf-fdeb-42ad-b862-08a74182c8bd.name: Insomniac (Mild)
f620efaf-fdeb-42ad-b862-08a74182c8bd.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 3d 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

574a8b88-0018-40e3-9736-e7620b658731.name: Insomniac (Severe)
574a8b88-0018-40e3-9736-e7620b658731.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 2d-1 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

8175834e-c0d2-4049-89c6-488867fd5268.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

e0f1aeb7-14b6-49b3-916a-cae30d7b4741.name: Intervention Service (I-Cop)
e0f1aeb7-14b6-49b3-916a-cae30d7b4741.notes: Add 8 more points to any 1 skill as an "aptitude skill"

9f7f3066-1469-4cab-922d-edcbafa83a44.name: Choose 1 Division Skill Package
9f7f3066-1469-4cab-922d-edcbafa83a44.notes: Packages denoted with † change duty to hazardous and require -5 more points in disadvantages.

1eeb2f54-0952-41d9-8c16-2879091fbfa9.name: Academy†
1eeb2f54-0952-41d9-8c16-2879091fbfa9.notes: Additionally assign 7 points to skills representing instructional specialties
